categories.title: [Display Name (e.g. Launched, Rolling Out, In Development, Cancelled)]
categories.text: [Description text for category (e.g. Fully released features to Office 365 generally available for all applicable customers)]

items.title: [Title of item (e.g. Sync to the cloud)]
items.image: [OCMS AssetID of image to display with item. Blank if no picture]
items.image-alt: [Alt text description of image (required for accessibility)]
items.link: [OCMS AssetID of external link for “Learn More.” Link at end of description text. If blank no “Learn More” link will be displayed.]
